text: E jenumanja ŵankulupilile! Naga n’di mwalombile achakongwe ŵakulupilila, kaneka ni kwaleka ulombela nkanim’biche mwakwakwaya (gona ulombela), basi nganinkola jenumanja pa ŵanganyao eda (lilinda lya pakumala kwa ulombela) jilijose jatim’balanjile. Sano mwapani liŵale, ni mwaleche kwaleka kwambone
